Package rocks.bastion.core.builder

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssertionsBuilder<MODEL>
    Defines the operations which a user can perform on a Bastion builder before any assertions object is added to the test.
    BastionBuilder<MODEL>
    The first interface for the Bastion fluent-builder allowing the user to bind a model type, apply assertions, apply a callback function and initiate the test.
    BindBuilder
    Defines the operations that can be performed on a Bastion builder before it has been bound to a model type.
    CallbackBuilder<MODEL>
    Defines the operations which a user can perform on a Bastion builder before any callbacks have been added to the test.
    ExecuteRequestBuilder<MODEL>
    Specifies the operations available on a Bastion test builder before it has been executed.
    PostExecutionBuilder<MODEL>
    Specifies the operations available on a Bastion fluent-builder after the test has been executed with ExecuteRequestBuilder.call() and a response has been obtained.
